languages.text: Найденная Вольным Торговцем призма гемункула способна настраиваться на друкарские маяки, расположенные по всему Простору. Установив связь со вторым маяком, также питаемым страданиями омерзительных мутантов, ксеноартефакт вновь активировался. Устройство указало путь к следующей планете — расколотому миру в системе Лапидус Мортус.

The Haemonculus's prism found by the Rogue Trader is capable of tuning into Drukhari beacons located throughout the Expanse. After establishing a link to a second beacon, also powered by the suffering of hideous mutants, the xeno-artefact reactivated. The device pointed the way to the next planet, a shattered world in the Lapidus Mortus System.
languages.original_text: Найденная Вольным Торговцем призма гемункула способна настраиваться на друкарские маяки, расположенные по всему Простору. languages.text: 血伶人的棱镜可以与整个科罗努斯扩区的黑暗灵族信标产生共鸣。行商浪人发现了第二个信标，信标的动力源同样来自惨遭折磨的变种人。激活信标之后，棱镜再次被唤醒，指明了通往下一颗行星的道路。接下来的目标，是死寂岩区中的某个破碎世界。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism found by the Rogue Trader is capable of tuning into Drukhari beacons located throughout the Expanse. After establishing a link to a second beacon, also powered by the suffering of hideous mutants, the xeno-artefact reactivated. The device pointed the way to the next planet, a shattered world in the Lapidus Mortus System.

traits.locale_text: 血伶人的棱镜可以与整个科罗努斯扩区的黑暗灵族信标产生共鸣。行商浪人发现了第二个信标，信标的动力源同样来自惨遭折磨的变种人。激活信标之后，棱镜再次被唤醒，指明了通往下一颗行星的道路。接下来的目标，是死寂岩区中的某个破碎世界。

languages.text: Le prisme de l'hémoncule trouvé par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est capable de repérer les balises drukharis installées un peu partout dans les Étendues. Après s'être connecté à une deuxième balise, également alimentée par la souffrance d'immondes mutants, le xéno-artefact s'est réactivé pour fournir un itinéraire vers une autre planète, un monde brisé du système de Lapidus Mortus.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism found by the Rogue Trader is capable of tuning into Drukhari beacons located throughout the Expanse. After establishing a link to a second beacon, also powered by the suffering of hideous mutants, the xeno-artefact reactivated. The device pointed the way to the next planet, a shattered world in the Lapidus Mortus System.

traits.locale_text: Le prisme de l'hémoncule trouvé par {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est capable de repérer les balises drukharis installées un peu partout dans les Étendues. Après s'être connecté à une deuxième balise, également alimentée par la souffrance d'immondes mutants, le xéno-artefact s'est réactivé pour fournir un itinéraire vers une autre planète, un monde brisé du système de Lapidus Mortus.

languages.text: El prisma del Hemónculo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente encontró puede sintonizar balizas Drukhari repartidas por la Extensión. Tras conectarse con una segunda baliza alimentada por el sufrimiento de unos mutantes aborrecibles, el xenoartefacto se reactivó. El dispositivo indicó el camino al siguiente planeta, un mundo devastado del sistema Lapidus Mortus.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism found by the Rogue Trader is capable of tuning into Drukhari beacons located throughout the Expanse. After establishing a link to a second beacon, also powered by the suffering of hideous mutants, the xeno-artefact reactivated. The device pointed the way to the next planet, a shattered world in the Lapidus Mortus System.

traits.locale_text: El prisma del Hemónculo que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente encontró puede sintonizar balizas Drukhari repartidas por la Extensión. Tras conectarse con una segunda baliza alimentada por el sufrimiento de unos mutantes aborrecibles, el xenoartefacto se reactivó. El dispositivo indicó el camino al siguiente planeta, un mundo devastado del sistema Lapidus Mortus.

languages.text: 自由開拓者が発見したハモンキュラスのプリズムには、エクスパンス全域に設置されたデュカーリのビーコンと接続できる能力がある。2つ目のビーコンとのリンクを形成し、また、醜悪な変異体の苦しみから力を得て、異種族のアーティファクトは再起動した。機器は次なる星、ラプディアス・モータス惑星にある荒廃惑星への道を示した。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism found by the Rogue Trader is capable of tuning into Drukhari beacons located throughout the Expanse. After establishing a link to a second beacon, also powered by the suffering of hideous mutants, the xeno-artefact reactivated. The device pointed the way to the next planet, a shattered world in the Lapidus Mortus System.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者が発見したハモンキュラスのプリズムには、エクスパンス全域に設置されたデュカーリのビーコンと接続できる能力がある。2つ目のビーコンとのリンクを形成し、また、醜悪な変異体の苦しみから力を得て、異種族のアーティファクトは再起動した。機器は次なる星、ラプディアス・モータス惑星にある荒廃惑星への道を示した。

languages.text: Das Prisma des Haemonculus, welches {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gefunden hat, kann sich mit Drukhari-Sendern in der gesamten Ausdehnung verbinden. Nachdem das Xeno-Artefakt eine Verbindung zu einem zweiten Sender aufgebaut hatte, der ebenfalls vom Leid grauenhafter Mutanten angetrieben wurde, wurde es wieder aktiviert. Das Gerät wies den Weg zum nächsten Planeten, einer zertrümmerten Welt im System Lapidus Mortus.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism found by the Rogue Trader is capable of tuning into Drukhari beacons located throughout the Expanse. languages.text: Haimonkulus'un Hür Tacir tarafından bulunan prizması, Enginlik'e yayılmış Drukhari parıldaklarıyla iletişime geçme kabiliyetine sahip. İkinci bir parıldakla bağlantı kuran ve ucube mutantların acılarından güç alan zeno eseri, yeniden faaliyete geçti. Aygıt bir sonraki gezegeni, Lapidus Mortus Sistemi'ndeki bir çatlak dünyayı işaret etti.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus's prism found by the Rogue Trader is capable of tuning into Drukhari beacons located throughout the Expanse. After establishing a link to a second beacon, also powered by the suffering of hideous mutants, the xeno-artefact reactivated. The device pointed the way to the next planet, a shattered world in the Lapidus Mortus System.
